original_text: Jotham did things that the Lord said were good, as his father Uzziah had done. But he did not try to go into the Lord's temple and offer incense, as his father had done. But the people continued to do bad things. Chronicles 26 Chronicles 28
korean_text: 요담이 그의 아버지 웃시야의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하였으나 여호와의 성전에는 들어가지 아니하였고 백성은 여전히 부패하였더라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord said were good
as his father Uzziah had done
But he did not try to go into the Lord's temple
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 주의 성전에 들어가려 하지 않았고

sentences.original_text: But the people continued to do bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 백성들은 계속해서 악한 일을 행했다
